page.title: 08BROUGHTY FERRY - HOUSING
page.content: Broughty Ferry contains a large variety of different types of housing. House types include flats, villas, bungalows, mansions and individually designed houses. Although private housing predominates there are several council house developments. Many older large houses were originally owned by Dundee Jute Barons. They were built on vantage sites and are clearly visible from the sea front.Many of these have now been converted into flats. This area caters for the elderly and infirm by providing sheltered houses in congenial settings. The residents in this type of accommodation are caringly and sympathetically looked after.
